title: ADULT & NON FORMAL EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) subjects.
subjects: English Language and any three (3) subjects.

title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes in English Language and any three (3) of

 

1. Agricultural Science

2. Mathematics

3. Chemistry

4. Biology

5. Health Science

6. Integrated/Rural Science

7. Physics

8. Nature Study and

9. General Science.

 

NB

GROUP A:

1. Agricultural Science

2. Biology

3. Nutrition

4. Health Science.

5. Applied Biology

 

GROUP B:

1. Physics

2. Chemistry

3. Mathematics

4.Basic Mathematics/Arithmetic Process

5. Economics

6. Geography

7. Social Studies

8. Integrated Science

9. General Science
subjects: Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Biology/General Science or Mathematics.

title: EARLY CHILDHOOD CARE EDUCATION
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: ENGLISH(DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any other two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: ENGLISH/CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English Language and Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/HAUSA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics,  Hausa, Literature in English and any other Arts  subject.
subjects: Literature in English and any other Arts subject

title: ENGLISH/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Islamic Studies, Literature in English and one (1) Arts subject.

title: HOME ECONOMICS (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the followings:

1.  Agricultural Science

2.  Biology

3.  Chemistry

4.  General Science

5.  Health Science

6.  Home Management/

7.  Hotel and Catering

8.  Food and Nutrition

9.  Integrated Science

10. Physical and Health Education/Physical Education

11. Physics

12. Economics

13. General Metal Work

14. Building/Engineering Drawing

15. Men/Ladies Garment    

     Construction and Finishing

16. Men/Ladies Textile   Design

17. Spinning 

18. Weaving

19. Surface Design and

     Printing

20. Bleaching, Dyeing and

     Finishing

21. Basic Electricity

 

GROUP A:

Home Economics, Home Management, Cookery, Needle Work and Dress Making, Clothing and Textile, Food and Nutrition, Hotel Management and Catering.

 

GROUP B:

Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Health Science, Agricultural Science, Mathematics/Arithmetic Process/Basic Mathematics, Economics, Physical and Health Education.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Home Economics, Economics and Mathematics.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE  (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Chemistry and any other Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry.

title: MATHEMATICS/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the following

1. Biology/Agricultural Science

2. Chemistry

3. Physics and

4. General Science
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of: Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History and two (2) of Social Science subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other two (2) of Economics/Commerce, Government/History, Government/Social Studies.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any other of History/Government, Geography, Social Studies, Economics/Commerce.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Geography/Social Studies.
subjects: Literature in English and any of Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/HAUSA
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Hausa and any two (2) of

1. Geography

2. History/Government

3. Islamic Studies/Christian Religious Studies

4. Economics
subjects: Hausa and any other two (2) Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies and any two (2) of

1. Economics

2. Government/History

3. Geography
subjects: Islamic Studies, Government/History and any one (1)  Social/Arts Subject.
